title: about Hextech Crafting
body: anyone know once we reach all champions what other use for the champion shards?

replies.body:
You can disenchant them for blue essence, you can then use that essence to unlock lvl 6 and 7 mastery for champions.

Or when a new champion comes out, you can re-roll 3 champion shards, and get the new champion for free (thats what I did with Kled and Ivern) 

Hope this helped ^^
I'd dodge the whole thing completely if I could begin again... just get the champs and skins I want with the RP rather than trying to chase rare and unbuyable skins lol
